Subskills.name: Insanity
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by berserk.

Subskills.name: Restless Feet
Subskills.description: Increases the movement speed bonus from berserk.

Subskills.name: Berserker's Insanity
Subskills.description: Increases berserk stat bonuses and max stacks.

Subskills.name: Dual Swing
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to perform an additional attack.

Subskills.name: Fearless Focus
Subskills.description: Increases attack rating when using berserk.

Subskills.name: Brutalize
Subskills.description: Chance to strike the monster with force causing pieces of it to scatter around and damage nearby targets.

Subskills.name: Axe Throw
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to throw a piercing axe towards your target inflicting armor break to all monsters hit.

Subskills.name: Bursting Madness
Subskills.description: Every strike now stacks to an additional buff unleashing a powerful area of effect pulse when reaching max stacks.

Subskills.name: Giant's Grasp
Subskills.description: Increases the power of attack damage from berserk stacks lowering attack speed scaling.

Subskills.name: Berserker's Reach
Subskills.description: Chance on berserk attack to increase its area of effect.

Subskills.name: Heavy Hitter
Subskills.description: Increases critical strike damage dealt when using berserk.

Subskills.name: Bring Me Another One
Subskills.description: Pull nearby monsters to the targets corpse on kill.

Subskills.name: Deadly Advantage
Subskills.description: Berserk no longer requires a melee weapon dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: GRAAAAAGH
Subskills.description: Every time you reach full stacks unleash a trembling pulse dealing increased damage scaling with full stat scaling consuming all stacks.
